subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fabian Espindola scored in the fourth minute and Real Salt Lake beat the Red Bulls, 1-0, stretching its home unbeaten streak to a Major League Soccer record-tying 22.
snippet: Fabian Espindola scored in the fourth minute and Real Salt Lake beat the Red Bulls, 1-0, stretching its home unbeaten streak to a Major League Soccer record-tying 22.
